attributes.action: Free School Meals - To Be Extended For All Primary Schools Across England.
attributes.additional_details:
This government must address this issue and provide free school meals for all primary school pupils across England. 

Parents, teachers & the general public have spoken in favour of this.
attributes.background: Many children go hungry or don't eat for hours, until they return home for their evening meal. We must address this, as it can have an impact on a child's mental health & study focus. Child food poverty has nearly doubled last year to almost 4 million children.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630385
